casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mario Andrette McNEILL. No. 446A13-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 24, 2016. Benjamin Dowling-Sendor, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McNeill, Mario Andrette. Andrew DeSimone, Assistant Appellate Defender, for McNeill, Mario Andrette. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. William West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, for McNeill, Mario Andrette. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of March 2016 by Defendant-Appellant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of March 2016."

Defendant-Appellant shall have up to and including the 13th day of April 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
